directions: spread chickpeas on a baking sheet and coat in olive oil, chili powder and sea salt (use more of less of the recommended salt/chili powder to your taste preference!)
bake at 400 degrees for 20-30 minutes or until chickpeas are crispy!
ingredients: 3 1/2 tablespoons olive oil or grape seed oil
*optional chives to garnish, lime for an extra kick!
title: chili roasted chickpeas
